channel.title: Retirement – Wellspring Financial
channel.description: Guiding you to a brighter financial future.

item.title: Can your pension sustain your retirement?
item.dc:creator: Rachael Khan
item.description: Working out how long your pension pot will need to last – as life expectancy rises – is worth thinking about sooner than later. The lockdown caused many people to reassess their lifestyles, which for some meant choosing early retirement. But what retirees have found is that pension pots are not matching the period of […]

item.title: Plan for what is difficult while it is easy – Sun Tzu
item.dc:creator: Rachael Khan
item.description: We all know we need to save for retirement, don’t we? But we also know it’s not always that easy to find the spare cash required to do so, especially amid a global pandemic. Research studies, though, typically show that many retirees wish they’d saved on a more consistent basis and managed to accumulate a […]

item.title: Could you live on the State Pension?
item.dc:creator: Rachael Khan
item.description: Let’s be honest, on the morning of 21 October few of us were waiting with bated breath as the latest UK inflation stats were revealed. But, for millions of people, that moment was significant. That’s because the September (Consumer Price Index) CPI inflation figure forms part of the government’s ‘triple lock’ formula used to determine […]
